tp:error.name: General
tp:error.tp:docstring: This is a drab, nondescript error.

tp:error.name: StartingInProgress
tp:error.tp:docstring: The request could not be processed because the VPN connection is already being started.

tp:error.name: AlreadyStarted
tp:error.tp:docstring: The request could not be processed because a VPN connection was already active.

tp:error.name: StoppingInProgress
tp:error.tp:docstring: The request could not be processed because the VPN connection is already being stopped.

tp:error.name: AlreadyStopped
tp:error.tp:docstring: The request could not be processed because the VPN connection was already stopped.

tp:error.name: WrongState
tp:error.tp:docstring: The request could not be processed because the VPN connection is in the wrong state for this type of request. FIXME: too general?

tp:error.name: BadArguments
tp:error.tp:docstring: Invalid arguments were passed with the request. FIXME: too general.

tp:error.name: LaunchFailed
tp:error.tp:docstring: A binary providing the service failed to launch.

tp:error.name: ConnectionInvalid
tp:error.tp:docstring: The request could not be processed because the VPN connection settings were invalid.
